sentences.sContent: I have sent  Tom back for your handbag.
sentences.sContent_eng: I have sent Tom back for your handbag.
sentences.sCn: 我已经让汤姆回去取你的手提袋了。

sentences.sContent: Will you please remove your handbag from the seat?
sentences.sContent_eng: Will you please remove your handbag from the seat?
sentences.sCn: 您把您的手提包从座位上拿开好吗?

trans.tranOther: a small bag in which a woman carries money and personal things
